ing.item: (15 oz) frozen white dinner roll dough, 18-24 ball total

directions.step:
Generously grease 10 in fluted tube pan. Sprinkle pecans in bottom of pan. Arrange frozen dough balls on top of pecans. Sprinkle pudding mix over dough. In a small saucepan cook andstir brown sugar, butter or marg, and cinnamon till butter is melted. Pour butter mixture over pudding mix and dough balls in the tube pan.Cover and refrigerate for 12 to 24 hrs. Uncover and bake in 350 oven about 30 minutes or till top is golden brown. Uncover and bake in 350 F. 30 min or till golden brown.Immediately invert let stand 15 min. to cool slightly Serves 12 Source Better Homes Recipes from Country Inns, submitted & tnt by marina
Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by acandice@juno.com (angie c Valencia) on Mar 7, 1997.
